title: Priyanka Chopra celebrates Diwali with Nick Jonas in Cabo
text:
Priyanka and Nick sent the good vibes from Cabo (Picture: Priyanka Chopra, Instagram)

Priyanka Chopra is currently enjoying a getaway with husband Nick Jonas but made sure to wish her fans a happy Diwali.

The Baywatch actress has jetted off to Cabo San Lucas, Mexico with her popstar husband and a group of friends this weekend.

As the Diwali festival celebrations took place around the world, Priyanka shared a sweet photo of her gazing into Nick’s eyes on Instagram.

Dressed in a gold saree with pink flowers, the Bollywood actress is seen looking lovingly at the Jonas Brothers singer who cuddles her affectionately.

Priyanka wrote in the caption: ‘Happy Diwali to everyone celebrating. From mine to yours… #diwaliincabo #peaceandprosperity.’

Other photos show the couple sitting with a big group of friends around the table, while Priyanka has a small child sitting on her lap. Another snap from the evening includes a stunning photo of their holiday home, with the pool glistening under the fairy lights.

Among the friends who have joined them on the trip, includes Roc Nation’s general manager of artist management Hank, who looks after the Jonas Brothers, as well as singer Jordan McGraw.

Last week, Nick celebrated Karva Chauth with cute photos of him and Priyanka larking around with the caption: ‘My wife is Indian. She is Hindu, and she is incredible in every way. She has taught me so much about her culture and religion.

‘I love and admire her so much, and as you can see we have fun together. Happy Karva Chauth to everyone!’

The couple are approaching their first wedding anniversary after tying the knot in December 2018 during a week-long celebration in India.

Since then, married life has been pretty sweet for the pair who often share their love on social media.

But Priyanka recently admitted they like to keep parts of their relationship private where they can, despite the fame.

Speaking to Metro.co.uk, the actress said: ‘We both have had almost 20-year careers as public people, and I think [the attention] is something we’re used to.

‘We find our privacy where we need to find it. We both know how to hide very well, and when we have to, we do. But the fact is it’s the life we’ve chosen, and it’s something we know.’

She added: ‘We’re good, very busy both of us, but we’re doing alright. We’re doing good.’
